respStmt.name: EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis

change.item: Text scanned at U. Chicago in 1988. Basic SGML tagging by EM, Scott Ettinger and Roger Travis.
Final check of cardbreaks, tags, and linenumbers.
Compare with TLG text for missing words or other scanner omissions.
Fixed card breaks at 113, 127, 144, 342 and 906 and added 128b, 130b, 143b, 343b, and 906b for lines miscounted in the Loeb edition.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
sp.p:
*xqono\s me\n e)s thlouro\n h(/komen pe/don,
*sku/qhn e)s oi(=mon, a)/baton ei)s e)rhmi/an.
*(/hfaiste, soi\ de\ xrh\ me/lein e)pistola\s
a(/s soi path\r e)fei=to, to/nde pro\s pe/trais
u(yhlokrh/mnois to\n lewrgo\n o)xma/sai
a)damanti/nwn desmw=n e)n a)rrh/ktois pe/dais.
to\ so\n ga\r a)/nqos, pante/xnou puro\s se/las,
qnhtoi=si kle/yas w)/pasen. toia=sde/ toi
a(marti/as sfe dei= qeoi=s dou=nai di/khn,
w(s a)\n didaxqh=| th\n *dio\s turanni/da
ste/rgein, filanqrw/pou de\ pau/esqai tro/pou.

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.p:
*kra/tos *bi/a te, sfw=|n me\n e)ntolh\ *dio\s
e)/xei te/los dh\ kou)de\n e)mpodw\n e)/ti:
e)gw\ d' a)/tolmo/s ei)mi suggenh= qeo\n
dh=sai bi/a| fa/raggi pro\s dusxeime/rw|.
pa/ntws d' a)na/gkh tw=nde/ moi to/lman sxeqei=n:
e)cwria/zein ga\r patro\s lo/gous baru/.
th=s o)rqobou/lou *qe/midos ai)pumh=ta pai=,
a)/konta/ s' a)/kwn duslu/tois xalkeu/masi
prospassaleu/sw tw=|d' a)panqrw/pw| pa/gw|
i(/n' ou)/te fwnh\n ou)/te tou morfh\n brotw=n
o)/yei, staqeuto\s d' h(li/ou foi/bh| flogi\
xroia=s a)mei/yeis a)/nqos. a)sme/nw| de/ soi
h( poikilei/mwn nu\c a)pokru/yei fa/os,
pa/xnhn q' e(w/|an h(/lios skeda=| pa/lin:
a)ei\ de\ tou= paro/ntos a)xqhdw\n kakou=
tru/sei s': o( lwfh/swn ga\r ou) pe/fuke/ pw.
toiau=t' e)phu/rw tou= filanqrw/pou tro/pou.
qeo\s qew=n ga\r ou)x u(popth/sswn xo/lon
brotoi=si tima\s w)/pasas pe/ra di/khs.
a)nq' w(=n a)terph= th/nde frourh/seis pe/tran
o)rqosta/dhn, a)/upnos, ou) ka/mptwn go/nu:
pollou\s d' o)durmou\s kai\ go/ous a)nwfelei=s
fqe/gch|: *dio\s ga\r dusparai/thtoi fre/nes.
a(/pas de\ traxu\s o(/stis a)\n ne/on krath=|.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
*(/hfaistos
sp.p: to\ suggene/s toi deino\n h(/ q' o(mili/a.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
sp.p:
su/mfhm': a)nhkoustei=n de\ tw=n patro\s lo/gwn
oi(=o/n te pw=s; ou) tou=to deimai/neis ple/on;

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.p: ai)ei/ ge dh\ nhlh\s su\ kai\ qra/sous ple/ws.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
sp.p:
a)/kos ga\r ou)de\n to/nde qrhnei=sqai. su\ de\
ta\ mhde\n w)felou=nta mh\ po/nei ma/thn.

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.p: w)= polla\ mishqei=sa xeirwnaci/a.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
sp.p:
ti/ nin stugei=s; po/nwn ga\r w(s a(plw=| lo/gw|
tw=n nu=n paro/ntwn ou)de\n ai)ti/a te/xnh.

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.p: e)/mpas tis au)th\n a)/llos w)/felen laxei=n.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
sp.p:
a(/pant' e)paxqh= plh\n qeoi=si koiranei=n:
e)leu/qeros ga\r ou)/tis e)sti\ plh\n *dio/s.

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.p: e)/gnwka toi=sde kou)de\n a)nteipei=n e)/xw.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
sp.p:
ou)/koun e)pei/ch| tw=|de desma\ peribalei=n,
w(s mh/ s' e)linu/onta prosderxqh=| path/r;

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.p: kai\ dh\ pro/xeira ya/lia de/rkesqai pa/ra.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
sp.p:
balw/n nin a)mfi\ xersi\n e)gkratei= sqe/nei
r(aisth=ri qei=ne, passa/leue pro\s pe/trais.

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.p: perai/netai dh\ kou) mata=| tou)/rgon to/de.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
sp.p:
a)/rasse ma=llon, sfi/gge, mhdamh=| xa/la.
deino\s ga\r eu(rei=n ka)c a)mhxa/nwn po/ron.

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.p: a)/raren h(/de g' w)le/nh duseklu/tws.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
sp.p:
kai\ th/nde nu=n po/rpason a)sfalw=s, i(/na
ma/qh| sofisth\s w)\n *dio\s nwqe/steros.

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.p: plh\n tou=d' a)\n ou)dei\s e)ndi/kws me/myaito/ moi.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
sp.p:
a)damanti/nou nu=n sfhno\s au)qa/dh gna/qon
ste/rnwn diampa\c passa/leu' e)rrwme/nws.

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.p: ai)ai=, *promhqeu=, sw=n u(perste/nw po/nwn.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
sp.p:
su\ d' au)= katoknei=s tw=n *dio/s t' e)xqrw=n u(/per
ste/neis; o(/pws mh\ sauto\n oi)ktiei=s pote.

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.p: o(ra=|s qe/ama dusqe/aton o)/mmasin.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
sp.p:
o(rw= kurou=nta to/nde tw=n e)paci/wn.
a)ll' a)mfi\ pleurai=s masxalisth=ras ba/le.

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.p: dra=n tau=t' a)na/gkh, mhde\n e)gke/leu' a)/gan.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
sp.p:
h)= mh\n keleu/sw ka)piqwu/cw ge pro/s.
xw/rei ka/tw, ske/lh de\ ki/rkwson bi/a|.

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.p: kai\ dh\ pe/praktai tou)/rgon ou) makrw=| po/nw|.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
sp.p:
e)rrwme/nws nu=n qei=ne diato/rous pe/das:
w(s ou(pitimhth/s ge tw=n e)/rgwn baru/s.

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.p: o(/moia morfh=| glw=ssa/ sou ghru/etai.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
sp.p:
su\ malqaki/zou, th\n d' e)mh\n au)qadi/an
o)rgh=s te traxu/thta mh\ 'pi/plhsse/ moi.

sp.speaker: *(/hfaistos
sp.p: stei/xwmen, w(s kw/loisin a)mfi/blhstr' e)/xei.

sp.speaker: *kra/tos
sp.p:
e)ntau=qa nu=n u(/brize kai\ qew=n ge/ra
sulw=n e)fhme/roisi prosti/qei. ti/ soi
oi(=oi/ te qnhtoi\ tw=nd' a)pantlh=sai po/nwn;
yeudwnu/mws se dai/mones *promhqe/a
kalou=sin: au)to\n ga/r se dei= promhqe/ws,
o(/tw| tro/pw| th=sd' e)kkulisqh/sh| te/xnhs.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
w)= di=os ai)qh\r kai\ taxu/pteroi pnoai/,
potamw=n te phgai/, ponti/wn te kuma/twn
a)nh/riqmon ge/lasma, pammh=to/r te gh=,
kai\ to\n pano/pthn ku/klon h(li/ou kalw=.
i)/desqe/ m' oi(=a pro\s qew=n pa/sxw qeo/s.
de/rxqhq' oi(/ais ai)kei/aisin
diaknaio/menos to\n murieth=

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
xro/non a)qleu/sw.
toio/nd' o( ne/os tago\s maka/rwn
e)chu=r' e)p' e)moi\ desmo\n a)eikh=.
feu= feu=, to\ paro\n to/ t' e)perxo/menon
ph=ma stena/xw, ph=| pote mo/xqwn
xrh\ te/rmata tw=nd' e)pitei=lai.
kai/toi ti/ fhmi; pa/nta proucepi/stamai
skeqrw=s ta\ me/llont', ou)de/ moi potai/nion
ph=m' ou)de\n h(/cei. th\n peprwme/nhn de\ xrh\
ai)=san fe/rein w(s r(a=|sta, gignw/skonq' o(/ti
to\ th=s a)na/gkhs e)/st' a)dh/riton sqe/nos.
a)ll' ou)/te siga=n ou)/te mh\ siga=n tu/xas
oi(=o/n te/ moi ta/sd' e)sti/. qnhtoi=s ga\r ge/ra
porw\n a)na/gkais tai=sd' e)ne/zeugmai ta/las.
narqhkoplh/rwton de\ qhrw=mai puro\s
phgh\n klopai/an, h(\ dida/skalos te/xnhs
pa/shs brotoi=s pe/fhne kai\ me/gas po/ros.
toiw=nde poina\s a)mplakhma/twn ti/nw
u(paiqri/ois desmoi=s pepassaleume/nos.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
a)= a)= e)/a e)/a.
ti/s a)xw/, ti/s o)dma\ prose/pta m' a)feggh/s,
qeo/sutos, h)\ bro/teios, h)\ kekrame/nh;
i(/keto termo/nion e)pi\ pa/gon
po/nwn e)mw=n qewro/s, h)\ ti/ dh\ qe/lwn;
o(ra=te desmw/thn me du/spotmon qeo/n
to\n *dio\s e)xqro/n, to\n pa=si qeoi=s

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
di' a)pexqei/as e)lqo/nq' o(po/soi
th\n *dio\s au)lh\n ei)soixneu=sin,
dia\ th\n li/an filo/thta brotw=n.
feu= feu=, ti/ pot' au)= kina/qisma klu/w
pe/las oi)wnw=n; ai)qh\r d' e)lafrai=s
pteru/gwn r(ipai=s u(posuri/zei.
pa=n moi fobero\n to\ prose/rpon.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
mhde\n fobhqh=|s: fili/a
ga\r a(/de ta/cis pteru/gwn
qoai=s a(mi/llais prose/ba
to/nde pa/gon, patrw/|as
mo/gis pareipou=sa fre/nas.
kraipnofo/roi de/ m' e)/pemyan au)=rai:
ktu/pou ga\r a)xw\ xa/lubos
dih=|cen a)/ntrwn muxo/n, e)k
d' e)/plhce/ mou ta\n qemerw=pin ai)dw=:
su/qhn d' a)pe/dilos o)/xw| pterwtw=|.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
ai)ai= ai)ai=,
th=s polute/knou *thqu/os e)/kgona,
tou= peri\ pa=sa/n q' ei(lissome/nou
xqo/n' a)koimh/tw| r(eu/mati pai=des
patro\s, *)wkeanou=,
de/rxqht', e)si/desq' oi(/w| desmw=|,
prosporpato\s th=sde fa/raggos
skope/lois e)n a)/krois
froura\n a)/zhlon o)xh/sw.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
leu/ssw, *promhqeu=: fobera\
d' e)moi=sin o)/ssois o)mi/xla
prosh=|ce plh/rhs dakru/wn
so\n de/mas ei)sidou/sa|
pe/trais prosauaino/menon
tai=sd' a)damantode/toisi lu/mais.
ne/oi ga\r oi)akono/moi
kratou=s', *)olu/mpou: neoxmoi=s
de\ dh\ no/mois *zeu\s a)qe/tws kratu/nei.
ta\ pri\n de\ pelw/ria nu=n a)istoi=.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
ei) ga/r m' u(po\ gh=n ne/rqen q' *(/aidou
tou= nekrode/gmonos ei)s a)pe/raton
*ta/rtaron h(=ken,
desmoi=s a)lu/tois a)gri/ws pela/sas,
w(s mh/te qeo\s mh/te tis a)/llos
toi=sd' e)pegh/qei.
nu=n d' ai)qe/rion ki/nugm' o( ta/las
e)xqroi=s e)pi/xarta pe/ponqa.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
ti/s w(=de tlhsika/rdios
qew=n, o(/tw| ta/d' e)pixarh=;
ti/s ou) cunasxala=| kakoi=s
teoi=si, di/xa ge *dio/s; o( d' e)piko/tws a)ei\
qe/menos a)/gnampton no/on
da/mnatai *ou)rani/an
ge/nnan, ou)de\ lh/cei, pri\n a)\n h)\ kore/sh| ke/ar h)\ pala/ma| tini\
ta\n dusa/lwton e(/lh| tis a)rxa/n.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
h)= mh\n e)/t' e)mou=, kai/per kraterai=s
e)n guiope/dais ai)kizome/nou,
xrei/an e(/cei maka/rwn pru/tanis,
dei=cai to\ ne/on bou/leum' u(f' o(/tou
skh=ptron tima/s t' a)posula=tai.
kai/ m' ou)/ti meliglw/ssois peiqou=s
e)paoidai=sin qe/lcei, sterea/s t'
ou)/pot' a)peila\s pth/cas to/d' e)gw\
katamhnu/sw,
pri\n a)\n e)c a)gri/wn desmw=n xala/sh|
poina/s te ti/nein
th=sd' ai)kei/as e)qelh/sh|.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
su\ me\n qrasu/s te kai\ pikrai=s
du/aisin ou)de\n e)pixala=|s,
a)/gan d' e)leuqerostomei=s.
e)ma\s de\ fre/nas e)re/qise dia/toros fo/bos:
de/dia d' a)mfi\ sai=s tu/xais,
pa=| pote tw=nde po/nwn
xrh/ se te/rma ke/l-
sant' e)sidei=n: a)ki/xhta ga\r h)/qea kai\ ke/ar
a)para/muqon e)/xei *kro/nou pai=s.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
oi)=d' o(/ti traxu\s kai\ par' e(autw=|
to\ di/kaion e)/xwn *zeu/s. a)ll' e)/mpas o)i/w
malakognw/mwn
e)/stai poq', o(/tan tau/th| r(aisqh=|:
th\n d' a)te/ramnon store/sas o)rgh\n
ei)s a)rqmo\n e)moi\ kai\ filo/thta
speu/dwn speu/donti/ poq' h(/cei.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
pa/nt' e)kka/luyon kai\ ge/gwn' h(mi=n lo/gon,
poi/w| labw/n se *zeu\s e)p' ai)tia/mati,
ou(/tws a)ti/mws kai\ pikrw=s ai)ki/zetai:
di/dacon h(ma=s, ei)/ ti mh\ bla/ptei lo/gw|.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
a)lgeina\ me/n moi kai\ le/gein e)sti\n ta/de,
a)/lgos de\ siga=n, pantaxh=| de\ du/spotma.
e)pei\ ta/xist' h)/rcanto dai/mones xo/lou
sta/sis t' e)n a)llh/loisin w)roqu/neto,
oi( me\n qe/lontes e)kbalei=n e(/dras *kro/non,
w(s *zeu\s a)na/ssoi dh=qen, oi( de\ tou)/mpalin
speu/dontes, w(s *zeu\s mh/pot' a)/rceien qew=n,
e)ntau=q' e)gw\ ta\ lw=|sta bouleu/wn piqei=n
*tita=nas, *ou)ranou= te kai\ *xqono\s te/kna,
ou)k h)dunh/qhn. ai(mu/las de\ mhxana\s
a)tima/santes karteroi=s fronh/masin
w)/|ont' a)moxqei\ pro\s bi/an te despo/sein:
e)moi\ de\ mh/thr ou)x a(/pac mo/non *qe/mis,
kai\ *gai=a, pollw=n o)noma/twn morfh\ mi/a,
to\ me/llon krai/noito prouteqespi/kei,
w(s ou) kat' i)sxu\n ou)de\ pro\s to\ kartero/n
xrei/h, do/lw| de\ tou\s u(persxo/ntas kratei=n.
toiau=t' e)mou= lo/goisin e)chgoume/nou
ou)k h)ci/wsan ou)de\ prosble/yai to\ pa=n.
kra/tista dh/ moi tw=n parestw/twn to/te
e)fai/net' ei)=nai proslabo/nta mhte/ra
e(ko/nq' e(ko/nti *zhni\ sumparastatei=n.
e)mai=s de\ boulai=s *tarta/rou melambaqh\s
keuqmw\n kalu/ptei to\n palaigenh= *kro/non
au)toi=si summa/xoisi. toia/d' e)c e)mou=
o( tw=n qew=n tu/rannos w)felhme/nos
kakai=si poinai=s tai=sde\ m' e)chmei/yato.
e)/nesti ga/r pws tou=to th=| turanni/di
no/shma, toi=s fi/loisi mh\ pepoiqe/nai.
o(\ d' ou)=n e)rwta=t', ai)ti/an kaq' h(/ntina
ai)ki/zetai/ me, tou=to dh\ safhniw=.
o(/pws ta/xista to\n patrw=|on e)s qro/non
kaqe/zet', eu)qu\s dai/mosin ne/mei ge/ra
a)/lloisin a)/lla kai\ diestoixi/zeto
a)rxh/n: brotw=n de\ tw=n talaipw/rwn lo/gon
ou)k e)/sxen ou)de/n', a)ll' a)istw/sas ge/nos
to\ pa=n e)/xrh|zen a)/llo fitu=sai ne/on.
kai\ toi=sin ou)dei\s a)nte/baine plh\n e)mou=.
e)gw\ d' e)to/lmhs': e)celusa/mhn brotou\s
to\ mh\ diarraisqe/ntas ei)s *(/aidou molei=n.
tw=| toi toiai=sde phmonai=si ka/mptomai,
pa/sxein me\n a)lgeinai=sin, oi)ktrai=sin d' i)dei=n:
qnhtou\s d' e)n oi)/ktw| proqe/menos, tou/tou tuxei=n
ou)k h)ciw/qhn au)to/s, a)lla\ nhlew=s
w(=d' e)rru/qmismai, *zhni\ duskleh\s qe/a.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
sidhro/frwn te ka)k pe/tras ei)rgasme/nos
o(/stis, *promhqeu=, soi=sin ou) sunasxala=|
mo/xqois: e)gw\ ga\r ou)/t' a)\n ei)sidei=n ta/de
e)/xrh|zon ei)sidou=sa/ t' h)lgu/nqhn ke/ar.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: kai\ mh\n fi/lois g' e)leino\s ei)sora=n e)gw/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: mh/ pou/ ti prou/bhs tw=nde kai\ peraite/rw;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: qnhtou/s g' e)/pausa mh\ prode/rkesqai mo/ron.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: to\ poi=on eu(rw\n th=sde fa/rmakon no/sou;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: tufla\s e)n au)toi=s e)lpi/das katw/|kisa.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: me/g' w)fe/lhma tou=t' e)dwrh/sw brotoi=s.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: pro\s toi=sde me/ntoi pu=r e)gw/ sfin w)/pasa.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: kai\ nu=n flogwpo\n pu=r e)/xous' e)fh/meroi;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: a)f' ou(= ge polla\s e)kmaqh/sontai te/xnas.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: toioi=sde dh/ se *zeu\s e)p' ai)tia/masin—

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: ai)ki/zetai/ te kou)damh=| xala=| kakw=n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: ou)d' e)/stin a)/qlou te/rma soi prokei/menon;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: ou)k a)/llo g' ou)de/n, plh\n o(/tan kei/nw| dokh=|.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
do/cei de\ pw=s; ti/s e)lpi/s; ou)x o(ra=|s o(/ti
h(/martes; w(s d' h(/martes ou)/t' e)moi\ le/gein
kaq' h(donh\n soi/ t' a)/lgos. a)lla\ tau=ta me\n
meqw=men, a)/qlou d' e)/klusin zh/tei tina/.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
e)lafro\n o(/stis phma/twn e)/cw po/da
e)/xei parainei=n nouqetei=n te to\n kakw=s
pra/ssont': e)gw\ de\ tau=q' a(/pant' h)pista/mhn.
e(kw\n e(kw\n h(/marton, ou)k a)rnh/somai:
qnhtoi=s a)rh/gwn au)to\s hu(ro/mhn po/nous.
ou) mh/n ti poinai=s g' w)|o/mhn toi/aisi/ me
katisxnanei=sqai pro\s pe/trais pedarsi/ois,
tuxo/nt' e)rh/mou tou=d' a)gei/tonos pa/gou.
kai/ moi ta\ me\n paro/nta mh\ du/resq' a)/xh,
pe/doi de\ ba=sai ta\s proserpou/sas tu/xas
a)kou/saq', w(s ma/qhte dia\ te/lous to\ pa=n.
pi/qesqe/ moi pi/qesqe, sumponh/sate
tw=| nu=n mogou=nti. tau)ta/ toi planwme/nh
pro\s a)/llot' a)/llon phmonh\ prosiza/nei.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
ou)k a)kou/sais e)peqw/ucas
tou=to, *promhqeu=.
kai\ nu=n e)lafrw=| podi\ kraipno/suton
qa=kon prolipou=s', ai)qe/ra q' a(gno\n
po/ron oi)wnw=n, o)krioe/ssh|
xqoni\ th=|de pelw=, tou\s sou\s de\ po/nous
xrh/|zw dia\ panto\s a)kou=sai.

sp.speaker: *)wkeano/s
sp.p:
h(/kw dolixh=s te/rma keleu/qou
diameiya/menos pro\s se/, *promhqeu=,
to\n pterugwkh= to/nd' oi)wno\n
gnw/mh| stomi/wn a)/ter eu)qu/nwn:
tai=s sai=s de\ tu/xais, i)/sqi, sunalgw=.
to\ te ga/r me, dokw=, suggene\s ou(/tws
e)sanagka/zei,
xwri/s te ge/nous ou)k e)/stin o(/tw|
mei/zona moi=ran nei/maim' h)\ soi/.
gnw/sh| de\ ta/d' w(s e)/tum', ou)de\ ma/thn
xaritoglwssei=n e)/ni moi: fe/re ga\r
sh/main' o(/ ti xrh/ soi sumpra/ssein:
ou) ga/r pot' e)rei=s w(s *)wkeanou=
fi/los e)sti\ bebaio/tero/s soi.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
e)/a: ti/ xrh=ma leu/ssw; kai\ su\ dh\ po/nwn e)mw=n
h(/keis e)po/pths; pw=s e)to/lmhsas, lipw\n
e)pw/numo/n te r(eu=ma kai\ petrhrefh=
au)to/ktit' a)/ntra, th\n sidhromh/tora
e)lqei=n e)s ai)=an; h)= qewrh/swn tu/xas
e)ma\s a)fi=cai kai\ sunasxalw=n kakoi=s;
de/rkou qe/ama, to/nde to\n *dio\s fi/lon,
to\n sugkatasth/santa th\n turanni/da,
oi(/ais u(p' au)tou= phmonai=si ka/mptomai.

sp.speaker: *)wkeano/s
sp.p:
o(rw=, *promhqeu=, kai\ paraine/sai ge/ soi
qe/lw ta\ lw=|sta, kai/per o)/nti poiki/lw|.
gi/gnwske sauto\n kai\ meqa/rmosai tro/pous
ne/ous: ne/os ga\r kai\ tu/rannos e)n qeoi=s.
ei) d' w(=de traxei=s kai\ teqhgme/nous lo/gous
r(i/yeis, ta/x' a)/n sou kai\ makra\n a)nwte/rw
qakw=n klu/oi *zeu/s, w(/ste soi to\n nu=n o)/xlon
paro/nta mo/xqwn paidia\n ei)=nai dokei=n.
a)ll', w)= talai/pwr', a(\s e)/xeis o)rga\s a)/fes,
zh/tei de\ tw=nde phma/twn a)pallaga/s.
a)rxai=' i)/sws soi fai/nomai le/gein ta/de:
toiau=ta me/ntoi th=s a)/gan u(yhgo/rou
glw/sshs, *promhqeu=, ta)pi/xeira gi/gnetai.
su\ d' ou)de/pw tapeino\s ou)d' ei)/keis kakoi=s,
pro\s toi=s parou=si d' a)/lla proslabei=n qe/leis.
ou)/koun e)/moige xrw/menos didaska/lw|
pro\s ke/ntra kw=lon e)ktenei=s, o(rw=n o(/ti
traxu\s mo/narxos ou)d' u(peu/qunos kratei=.
kai\ nu=n e)gw\ me\n ei)=mi kai\ peira/somai
e)a\n du/nwmai tw=nde/ s' e)klu=sai po/nwn.
su\ d' h(su/xaze mhd' a)/gan labrosto/mei.
h)\ ou)k oi)=sq' a)kribw=s w)\n perisso/frwn o(/ti
glw/ssh| matai/a| zhmi/a prostri/betai;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
zhlw= s' o(qou/nek' e)kto\s ai)ti/as kurei=s
tou/twn metasxei=n kai\ tetolmhkw\s e)moi/.
kai\ nu=n e)/ason mhde/ soi melhsa/tw.
pa/ntws ga\r ou) pei/seis nin: ou) ga\r eu)piqh/s.
pa/ptaine d' au)to\s mh/ ti phmanqh=|s o(dw=|.

sp.speaker: *)wkeano/s
sp.p:
pollw=| g' a)mei/nwn tou\s pe/las frenou=n e)/fus
h)\ sauto/n: e)/rgw| kou) lo/gw| tekmai/romai.
o(rmw/menon de\ mhdamw=s a)ntispa/sh|s.
au)xw= ga\r au)xw= th/nde dwrea\n e)moi\
dw/sein *di/', w(/ste tw=nde/ s' e)klu=sai po/nwn.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
ta\ me\n s' e)painw= kou)damh=| lh/cw pote/:
proqumi/as ga\r ou)de\n e)llei/peis. a)ta\r
mhde\n po/nei. ma/thn ga\r ou)de\n w)felw=n
e)moi\ ponh/seis, ei)/ ti kai\ ponei=n qe/leis.
a)ll' h(su/xaze sauto\n e)kpodw\n e)/xwn:
e)gw\ ga\r ou)k, ei) dustuxw=, tou=d' ei(/neka
qe/loim' a)\n w(s plei/stoisi phmona\s tuxei=n.
ou) dh=t' e)pei/ me kai\ kasignh/tou tu/xai
tei/rous' *)/atlantos, o(\s pro\s e(spe/rous to/pous
e(/sthke ki/on' ou)ranou= te kai\ xqono\s
w)/mois e)rei/dwn, a)/xqos ou)k eu)a/gkalon.
to\n ghgenh= te *kiliki/wn oi)kh/tora
a)/ntrwn i)dw\n w)/|ktira, da/ion te/ras
e(katogka/ranon pro\s bi/an xeirou/menon
*tufw=na qou=ron: pa=sin o(/s a)nte/sth qeoi=s,
smerdnai=si gamfhlai=si suri/zwn fo/bon:
e)c o)mma/twn d' h)/strapte gorgwpo\n se/las,
w(s th\n *dio\s turanni/d' e)kpe/rswn bi/a|:
a)ll' h)=lqen au)tw=| *zhno\s a)/grupnon be/los,
kataiba/ths kerauno\s e)kpne/wn flo/ga,
o(\s au)to\n e)ce/plhce tw=n u(yhgo/rwn
kompasma/twn. fre/nas ga\r ei)s au)ta\s tupei\s
e)feyalw/qh ka)cebronth/qh sqe/nos.
kai\ nu=n a)xrei=on kai\ para/oron de/mas
kei=tai stenwpou= plhsi/on qalassi/ou
i)pou/menos r(i/zaisin *ai)tnai/ais u(/po:
korufai=s d' e)n a)/krais h(/menos mudroktupei=
*(/hfaistos: e)/nqen e)kragh/sontai/ pote
potamoi\ puro\s da/ptontes a)gri/ais gna/qois
th=s kallika/rpou *sikeli/as leurou\s gu/as:
toio/nde *tufw\s e)canaze/sei xo/lon
qermoi=s a)pla/tou be/lesi purpno/ou za/lhs,
kai/per keraunw=| *zhno\s h)nqrakwme/nos.
su\ d' ou)k a)/peiros, ou)d' e)mou= didaska/lou
xrh/|zeis: seauto\n sw=|z' o(/pws e)pi/stasai:
e)gw\ de\ th\n parou=san a)ntlh/sw tu/xhn,
e)/st' a)\n *dio\s fro/nhma lwfh/sh| xo/lou.

sp.speaker: *)wkeano/s
sp.p:
ou)/koun, *promhqeu=, tou=to gignw/skeis, o(/ti
o)rgh=s nosou/shs ei)si\n i)atroi\ lo/goi;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
e)a/n tis e)n kairw=| ge malqa/ssh| ke/ar
kai\ mh\ sfrigw=nta qumo\n i)sxnai/nh| bi/a|.

sp.speaker: *)wkeano/s
sp.p:
e)n tw=| proqumei=sqai de\ kai\ tolma=n ti/na
o(ra=|s e)nou=san zhmi/an; di/daske/ me.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: mo/xqon perisso\n koufo/noun t' eu)hqi/an.

sp.speaker: *)wkeano/s
sp.p:
e)/a me th=|de th=| no/sw| nosei=n, e)pei\
ke/rdiston eu)= fronou=nta mh\ fronei=n dokei=n.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: e)mo\n dokh/sei ta)mpla/khm' ei)=nai to/de.

sp.speaker: *)wkeano/s
sp.p: safw=s m' e)s oi)=kon so\s lo/gos ste/llei pa/lin.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: mh\ ga/r se qrh=nos ou(mo\s ei)s e)/xqran ba/lh|.

sp.speaker: *)wkeano/s
sp.p: h)= tw=| ne/on qakou=nti pagkratei=s e(/dras;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: tou/tou fula/ssou mh/ pot' a)xqesqh=| ke/ar.

sp.speaker: *)wkeano/s
sp.p: h( sh/, *promhqeu=, sumfora\ dida/skalos.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: ste/llou, komi/zou, sw=|ze to\n paro/nta nou=n.

sp.speaker: *)wkeano/s
sp.p:
o(rmwme/nw| moi to/nd' e)qw/ucas lo/gon.
leuro\n ga\r oi(=mon ai)qe/ros yai/rei pteroi=s
tetraskelh\s oi)wno/s: a)/smenos de/ ta)\n
staqmoi=s e)n oi)kei/oisi ka/myeien go/nu.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
ste/nw se ta=s ou)lome/nas tu/xas, *promhqeu=:
dakrusi/stakta d' a)p' o)/sswn
r(adina\n leibome/na r(e/os pareia\n
noti/ois e)/tegca pagai=s:
a)me/garta ga\r ta/de *zeu\s
i)di/ois no/mois kratu/nwn
u(perh/fanon qeoi=s toi=s
pa/ros e)ndei/knusin ai)xma/n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
pro/pasa d' h)/dh stono/en le/lake xw/ra,
megalosxh/mona/ a)rxai-
opreph= ste/nousi ta\n sa\n
cunomaimo/nwn te tima/n,
o(po/soi t' e)/poikon a(gna=s
*)asi/as e(/dos ne/montai,
megalosto/noisi soi=s ph/-
masi sugka/mnousi qnatoi/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
*kolxi/dos te ga=s e)/noikoi
parqe/noi, ma/xas a)/trestoi,
kai\ *sku/qhs o(/milos, oi(\ ga=s
e)/sxaton to/pon a)mfi\ *mai-
w=tin e)/xousi li/mnan,

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
†*)arabi/as t' a)/reion a)/nqos,
u(yi/krhmnon oi(\ po/lisma
*kauka/sou pe/las ne/montai,
da/ios strato/s, o)cuprw/|-
roisi bre/mwn e)n ai)xmai=s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
†mo/non dh\ pro/sqen a)/llon e)n po/nois
dame/nt' a)damantode/tois
*tita=na lu/mais ei)sido/man, qeo/n,
*)/atlantos ai)e\n; u(pe/roxon sqe/nos krataio/n,
o(\s ou)ra/nio/n te po/lon
nw/tois ste/gwn u(postena/zei.†

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
boa=| de\ po/ntios klu/dwn
cumpi/tnwn, ste/nei buqo/s,
kelaino\s d' *)/aidos u(pobre/mei muxo\s ga=s,
pagai/ q' a(gnoru/twn potamw=n
ste/nousin a)/lgos oi)ktro/n.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
mh/ toi xlidh=| dokei=te mhd' au)qadi/a|
siga=n me: sunnoi/a| de\ da/ptomai ke/ar,
o(rw=n e)mauto\n w(=de prouselou/menon.
kai/toi qeoi=si toi=s ne/ois tou/tois ge/ra
ti/s a)/llos h)\ 'gw\ pantelw=s diw/risen;
a)ll' au)ta\ sigw=: kai\ ga\r ei)dui/aisin a)\n
u(mi=n le/goimi: ta)n brotoi=s de\ ph/mata
a)kou/saq', w(/s sfas nhpi/ous o)/ntas to\ pri\n
e)/nnous e)/qhka kai\ frenw=n e)phbo/lous.
le/cw de/, me/myin ou)/tin' a)nqrw/pois e)/xwn,
a)ll' w(=n de/dwk' eu)/noian e)chgou/menos:
oi(\ prw=ta me\n ble/pontes e)/blepon ma/thn,
klu/ontes ou)k h)/kouon, a)ll' o)neira/twn
a)li/gkioi morfai=si to\n makro\n bi/on
e)/furon ei)kh=| pa/nta, kou)/te plinqufei=s
do/mous prosei/lous, h)=|san, ou) culourgi/an:
katw/ruxes d' e)/naion w(/st' a)h/suroi
mu/rmhkes a)/ntrwn e)n muxoi=s a)nhli/ois.
h)=n d' ou)de\n au)toi=s ou)/te xei/matos te/kmar
ou)/t' a)nqemw/dous h)=ros ou)/te karpi/mou
qe/rous be/baion, a)ll' a)/ter gnw/mhs to\ pa=n
e)/prasson, e)/ste dh/ sfin a)ntola\s e)gw\
a)/strwn e)/deica ta/s te duskri/tous du/seis.
kai\ mh\n a)riqmo/n, e)/coxon sofisma/twn,
e)chu=ron au)toi=s, gramma/twn te sunqe/seis,
mnh/mhn a(pa/ntwn, mousomh/tor' e)rga/nhn.
ka)/zeuca prw=tos e)n zugoi=si knw/dala
zeu/glaisi douleu/onta sa/gmasi\n q', o(/pws
qnhtoi=s megi/stwn dia/doxoi moxqhma/twn
ge/noinq' , u(f' a(/rma t' h)/gagon filhni/ous
i(/ppous, a)/galma th=s u(perplou/tou xlidh=s.
qalasso/plagkta d' ou)/tis a)/llos a)nt' e)mou=
lino/pter' hu(=re nauti/lwn o)xh/mata.
toiau=ta mhxanh/mat' e)ceurw\n ta/las
brotoi=sin, au)to\s ou)k e)/xw so/fism' o(/tw|
th=s nu=n parou/shs phmonh=s a)pallagw=.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
pe/ponqas ai)ke\s ph=m': a)posfalei\s frenw=n
plana=|, kako\s d' i)atro\s w(/s tis e)s no/son
pesw\n a)qumei=s kai\ seauto\n ou)k e)/xeis
eu(rei=n o(poi/ois farma/kois i)a/simos.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
ta\ loipa/ mou klu/ousa qauma/sh| ple/on,
oi(/as te/xnas te kai\ po/rous e)mhsa/mhn.
to\ me\n me/giston, ei)/ tis e)s no/son pe/soi,
ou)k h)=n a)le/chm' ou)de/n, ou)/te brw/simon,
ou) xristo/n, ou)de\ pisto/n, a)lla\ farma/kwn
xrei/a| kateske/llonto, pri/n g' e)gw/ sfisin
e)/deica kra/seis h)pi/wn a)kesma/twn,
ai(=s ta\s a(pa/sas e)camu/nontai no/sous.
tro/pous te pollou\s mantikh=s e)stoi/xisa,
ka)/krina prw=tos e)c o)neira/twn a(\ xrh\
u(/par gene/sqai, klhdo/nas te duskri/tous
e)gnw/ris' au)toi=s e)nodi/ous te sumbo/lous:
gamywnu/xwn te pth=sin oi)wnw=n skeqrw=s
diw/ris', oi(/tine/s te decioi\ fu/sin
eu)wnu/mous te, kai\ di/aitan h(/ntina
e)/xous' e(/kastoi, kai\ pro\s a)llh/lous ti/nes
e)/xqrai te kai\ ste/rghqra kai\ sunedri/ai:
spla/gxnwn te leio/thta, kai\ xroia\n ti/na
e)/xous' a)\n ei)/h dai/mosin pro\s h(donh\n
xolh/, lobou= te poiki/lhn eu)morfi/an.
kni/sh| te kw=la sugkalupta\ kai\ makra\n
o)sfu=n purw/sas duste/kmarton e)s te/xnhn
w(/dwsa qnhtou/s, kai\ flogwpa\ sh/mata
e)cwmma/twsa, pro/sqen o)/nt' e)pa/rgema.
toiau=ta me\n dh\ tau=t': e)/nerqe de\ xqono\s
kekrumme/n', a)nqrw/poisin w)felh/mata,
xalko/n, si/dhron, a)/rguron, xruso/n te ti/s
fh/seien a)\n pa/roiqen e)ceurei=n e)mou=;
ou)dei/s, sa/f' oi)=da, mh\ ma/thn flu/sai qe/lwn.
braxei= de\ mu/qw| pa/nta sullh/bdhn ma/qe,
pa=sai te/xnai brotoi=sin e)k *promhqe/ws.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
mh/ nun brotou\s me\n w)fe/lei kairou= pe/ra,
sautou= d' a)kh/dei dustuxou=ntos. w(s e)gw\
eu)/elpi/s ei)mi tw=nde/ s' e)k desmw=n e)/ti
luqe/nta mhde\n mei=on i)sxu/sein *dio/s.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
ou) tau=ta tau/th| *moi=ra/ pw telesfo/ros
kra=nai pe/prwtai, muri/ais de\ phmonai=s
du/ais te kamfqei\s w(=de desma\ fugga/nw:
te/xnh d' a)na/gkhs a)sqeneste/ra makrw=|.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: ti/s ou)=n a)na/gkhs e)sti\n oi)akostro/fos;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: *moi=rai tri/morfoi mnh/mone/s t' *)erinu/es

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: tou/twn a)/ra *zeu/s e)stin a)sqene/steros;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: ou)/koun a)\n e)kfu/goi ge th\n peprwme/nhn.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: ti/ ga\r pe/prwtai *zhni\ plh\n a)ei\ kratei=n;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: tou=t' ou)ke/t' a)\n pu/qoio mhde\ lipa/rei.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: h)= pou/ ti semno/n e)stin o(\ cunampe/xeis.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
a)/llou lo/gou me/mnhsqe, to/nde d' ou)damw=s
kairo\s gegwnei=n, a)lla\ sugkalupte/os
o(/son ma/lista: to/nde ga\r sw/|zwn e)gw\
desmou\s a)eikei=s kai\ du/as e)kfugga/nw.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
mhda/m' o( pa/nta ne/mwn
qei=t' e)ma=| gnw/ma| kra/tos a)nti/palon *zeu/s,
mhd' e)linu/saimi qeou\s o(si/ais qoi/nais potinisome/na
boufo/nois par' *)wkeanou= patro\s a)/sbeston po/ron,
mhd' a)li/toimi lo/gois:
a)lla/ moi to/d' e)mme/noi kai\ mh/pot' e)ktakei/h:

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
a(du/ ti qarsale/ais
to\n makro\n tei/nein bi/on e)lpi/si, fanai=s
qumo\n a)ldai/nousan e)n eu)frosu/nais. fri/s-
sw de/ se derkome/na
muri/ois mo/xqois diaknaio/menon .
*zh=na ga\r ou) trome/wn
i)di/a| gnw/ma| se/bh| qnatou\s a)/gan, *promhqeu=.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
fe/r', o(/pws a)/xaris xa/ris, w)= fi/los:
ei)pe\ pou= ti/s a)lka/;
ti/s e)fameri/wn a)/rhcis; ou)d' e)de/rxqhs
o)ligodrani/an a)/kikun,
i)so/neiron, a(=| to\ fwtw=n
a)lao\n ge/nos e)mpepodisme/non; ou)/pote
ta\n *dio\s a(rmoni/an qnatw=n pareci/asi boulai/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
e)/maqon ta/de sa\s prosidou=s' o)lo-
a\s tu/xas, *promhqeu=.
to\ diamfi/dion de/ moi me/los prose/pta
to/d' e)kei=no/ q', o(/ t' a)mfi\ loutra\
kai\ le/xos so\n u(menai/oun
i)o/tati ga/mwn, o(/te ta\n o(mopa/trion e(/dnois
a)/gages *(hsio/nan pei/qw\n da/marta koino/lektron.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
*)iw/
sp.p:
a)= a)=, e)\ e)/,
xri/ei tis au)= me ta\n ta/lainan oi)=stros,
ei)/dwlon *)/argou ghgenou=s, a)/leu' a)= da=: fobou=mai
to\n muriwpo\n ei)sorw=sa bou/tan.
o( de\ poreu/etai do/lion o)/mm' e)/xwn,
o(\n ou)de\ katqano/nta gai=a keu/qei.
a)ll', e)me\ ta\n ta/lainan
e)c e)ne/rwn perw=n kunagetei=, plana=|
te nh=stin a)na\ ta\n parali/an ya/mman.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p:
u(po\ de\ khro/plastos o)tobei= do/nac
a)xe/tas u(pnodo/tan no/mon:
i)w\ i)w\ po/poi, poi= m' a)/gousi th-
le/plagktoi pla/nai;
ti/ pote/ m', w)= *kro/nie pai=, ti/ pote tai=sd'
e)ne/zeucas eu(rw\n a(martou=san e)n
phmonai=sin; e(\ e(/,
oi)strhla/tw| de\ dei/mati
deilai/an para/kopon w(=de tei/reis;
puri/ me fle/con, h)\ xqoni\ ka/luyon, h)/
ponti/ois da/kesi do\s bora/n,
mhde/ moi fqonh/sh|s
eu)gma/twn, a)/nac.
a)/dhn me polu/planoi pla/nai
gegumna/kasin, ou)d' e)/xw maqei=n o(/pa
phmona\s a)lu/cw.
klu/eis fqe/gma ta=s bou/kerw parqe/nou;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
pw=s d' ou) klu/w th=s oi)strodinh/tou ko/rhs,
th=s *)inaxei/as; h(\ *dio\s qa/lpei ke/ar
e)/rwti, kai\ nu=n tou\s u(permh/keis dro/mous
*(/hra| stughto\s pro\s bi/an gumna/zetai.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p:
po/qen e)mou= su\ patro\s o)/nom' a)pu/eis;
ei)pe/ moi ta=| mogera=| ti/s w)/n;
ti/s a)/ra m', w)= ta/las, ta\n ta/lainan w(=d'
e)/tuma prosqroei=s;
qeo/suto/n te no/son w)no/masas, a(\
marai/nei me xri/ousa ke/ntrois, i)w/,
foitale/oisin e(\ e(/:
skirthma/twn de\ nh/stisin
ai)kei/ais labro/sutos h)=lqon, *(/hras
e)piko/toisi mh/desi damei=sa. dus-
daimo/nwn de\ ti/nes oi(/, e(\ e(/,
oi(=' e)gw\ mogou=sin;
a)lla/ moi torw=s
te/kmhron o(/ ti m' e)pamme/nei
paqei=n, ti/ mh=xar, h)\ ti/ fa/rmakon no/sou,
dei=con, ei)/per oi)=sqa:
qro/ei, fra/ze ta=| duspla/nw| parqe/nw|.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
le/cw torw=s soi pa=n o(/per xrh/|zeis maqei=n,
ou)k e)mple/kwn ai)ni/gmat', a)ll' a(plw=| lo/gw|,
w(/sper di/kaion pro\s fi/lous oi)/gein sto/ma.
puro\s brotoi=s doth=r' o(ra=|s *promhqe/a.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p:
w)= koino\n w)fe/lhma qnhtoi=sin fanei/s,
tlh=mon *promhqeu=, tou= di/khn pa/sxeis ta/de;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: a(rmoi= pe/paumai tou\s e)mou\s qrhnw=n po/nous.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p: ou)/koun po/rois a)\n th/nde dwrea\n e)moi/;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: le/g' h(/ntin' ai)th=|: pa=n ga\r a)\n pu/qoio/ mou.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p: sh/mhnon o(/stis e)n fa/raggi/ s' w)/xmasen.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: bou/leuma me\n to\ *di=on, *(hfai/stou de\ xei/r.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p: poina\s de\ poi/wn a)mplakhma/twn ti/neis;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: tosou=ton a)rkw= soi safhni/sas mo/non.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p:
kai\ pro/s ge tou/tois te/rma th=s e)mh=s pla/nhs
dei=con, ti/s e)/stai th=| talaipw/rw| xro/nos.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: to\ mh\ maqei=n soi krei=sson h)\ maqei=n ta/de.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p: mh/toi me kru/yh|s tou=q' o(/per me/llw paqei=n.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: a)ll' ou) megai/rw tou=de/ soi dwrh/matos.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p: ti/ dh=ta me/lleis mh\ ou) gegwni/skein to\ pa=n;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: fqo/nos me\n ou)dei/s, sa\s d' o)knw= qra/cai fre/nas.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p: mh/ mou prokh/dou ma=sson w(s e)moi\ gluku/.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: e)pei\ proqumh=|, xrh\ le/gein. a)/koue dh/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
mh/pw ge: moi=ran d' h(donh=s ka)moi\ po/re.
th\n th=sde prw=ton i(storh/swmen no/son,
au)th=s legou/shs ta\s polufqo/rous tu/xas:
ta\ loipa\ d' a)/qlwn sou= didaxqh/tw pa/ra.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
so\n e)/rgon, *)ioi=, tai=sd' u(pourgh=sai xa/rin,
a)/llws te pa/ntws kai\ kasignh/tais patro/s.
w(s ta)poklau=sai ka)podu/rasqai tu/xas
e)ntau=q', o(/pou me/lloi tis oi)/sesqai da/kru
pro\s tw=n kluo/ntwn, a)ci/an tribh\n e)/xei.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p:
ou)k oi)=d' o(/pws u(mi=n a)pisth=sai/ me xrh/,
safei= de\ mu/qw| pa=n o(/per prosxrh/|zete
peu/sesqe: kai/toi kai\ le/gous' ai)sxu/nomai
qeo/ssuton xeimw=na kai\ diafqora\n
morfh=s, o(/qen moi sxetli/a| prose/ptato.
ai)ei\ ga\r o)/yeis e)/nnuxoi pwleu/menai
e)s parqenw=nas tou\s e)mou\s parhgo/roun
lei/oisi mu/qois w)= me/g' eu)/daimon ko/rh,
ti/ parqeneu/ei daro/n, e)co/n soi ga/mou
tuxei=n megi/stou; *zeu\s ga\r i(me/rou be/lei
pro\s sou= te/qalptai kai\ sunai/resqai *ku/prin
qe/lei: su\ d', w)= pai=, mh\ 'polakti/sh|s le/xos
to\ *zhno/s, a)ll' e)/celqe pro\s *le/rnhs baqu\n
leimw=na, poi/mnas bousta/seis te pro\s patro/s,
w(s a)\n to\ *di=on o)/mma lwfh/sh| po/qou.
toioi=sde pa/sas eu)fro/nas o)nei/rasi
suneixo/mhn du/sthnos, e)/ste dh\ patri\
e)/tlhn gegwnei=n nukti/foit' o)nei/rata.
o( d' e)/s te *puqw\ ka)pi\ *dwdw/nhs puknou\s
qeopro/pous i)/allen, w(s ma/qoi ti/ xrh\
drw=nt' h)\ le/gonta dai/mosin pra/ssein fi/la.
h(=kon d' a)nagge/llontes ai)olosto/mous
xrhsmou\s a)sh/mous duskri/tws t' ei)rhme/nous.
te/los d' e)nargh\s ba/cis h)=lqen *)ina/xw|
safw=s e)piskh/ptousa kai\ muqoume/nh
e)/cw do/mwn te kai\ pa/tras w)qei=n e)me/,
a)/feton a)la=sqai gh=s e)p' e)sxa/tois o(/rois:
kei) mh\ qe/loi, purwpo\n e)k *dio\s molei=n
kerauno/n, o(\s pa=n e)cai+stw/soi ge/nos.
toioi=sde peisqei\s *loci/ou manteu/masin
e)ch/lase/n me ka)pe/klh|se dwma/twn
a)/kousan a)/kwn: a)ll' e)phna/gkaze/ nin
*dio\s xalino\s pro\s bi/an pra/ssein ta/de.
eu)qu\s de\ morfh\ kai\ fre/nes dia/strofoi
h)=san, kerasti\s d', w(s o(ra=t', o)custo/mw|
mu/wpi xrisqei=s' e)mmanei= skirth/mati
h)=|sson pro\s eu)/poto/n te *kerxnei/as r(e/os
*le/rnhs te krh/nhn : bouko/los de\ ghgenh\s
a)/kratos o)rgh\n *)/argos w(ma/rtei, puknoi=s
o)/ssois dedorkw\s tou\s e)mou\s kata\ sti/bous.
a)prosdo/khtos d' au)to\n a)fni/dios mo/ros
tou= zh=n a)peste/rhsen. oi)stroplh\c d' e)gw\
ma/stigi qei/a| gh=n pro\ gh=s e)lau/nomai.
klu/eis ta\ praxqe/nt': ei) d' e)/xeis ei)pei=n o(/ ti
loipo\n po/nwn, sh/maine: mhde/ m' oi)kti/sas
cu/nqalpe mu/qois yeude/sin: no/shma ga\r
ai)/sxiston ei)=nai/ fhmi sunqe/tous lo/gous.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
e)/a e)/a, a)/pexe, feu=:
ou)/pot' ou)/pot' hu)/xoun w(=de ce/nous
molei=sqai lo/gous ei)s a)koa\n e)ma/n,
ou)d' w(=de dusqe/ata kai\ du/soista
ph/mata, lu/mata, dei/mata a)m-
fa/kei ke/ntrw| tu/yein yuxa\n e)ma/n.
i)w\ i)w\ moi=ra moi=ra,
pe/frik' ei)sidou=sa pra=cin *)iou=s.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
prw/| ge stena/zeis kai\ fo/bou ple/a tis ei)=:
e)pi/sxes e)/st' a)\n kai\ ta\ loipa\ prosma/qh|s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
le/g', e)kdi/daske: toi=s nosou=si/ toi gluku\
to\ loipo\n a)/lgos proucepi/stasqai torw=s.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
th\n pri/n ge xrei/an h)nu/sasq' e)mou= pa/ra
kou/fws: maqei=n ga\r th=sde prw=t' e)xrh/|zete
to\n a)mf' e(auth=s a)=qlon e)chgoume/nhs:
ta\ loipa\ nu=n a)kou/saq', oi(=a xrh\ pa/qh
tlh=nai pro\s *(/hras th/nde th\n nea/nida.
su/ t' *)ina/xeion spe/rma, tou\s e)mou\s lo/gous
qumw=| ba/l', w(s a)\n te/rmat' e)kma/qh|s o(dou=.
prw=ton me\n e)nqe/nd' h(li/ou pro\s a)ntola\s
stre/yasa sauth\n stei=x' a)nhro/tous gu/as:
*sku/qas d' a)fi/ch| noma/das, oi(\ plekta\s ste/gas
peda/rsioi nai/ous' e)p' eu)ku/klois o)/xois
e(khbo/lois to/coisin e)chrtume/noi:
oi(=s mh\ pela/zein, a)ll' a(listo/nois po/das
xri/mptousa r(axi/aisin e)kpera=n xqo/na.
laia=s de\ xeiro\s oi( sidhrote/ktones
oi)kou=si *xa/lubes, ou(\s fula/casqai/ se xrh/.
a)nh/meroi ga\r ou)de\ pro/splatoi ce/nois.
h(/ceis d' *(ubristh\n potamo\n ou) yeudw/numon,
o(\n mh\ pera/sh|s, ou) ga\r eu)/batos pera=n,
pri\n a)\n pro\s au)to\n *kau/kason mo/lh|s, o)rw=n
u(/yiston, e)/nqa potamo\s e)kfusa=| me/nos
krota/fwn a)p' au)tw=n. a)strogei/tonas de\ xrh\
korufa\s u(perba/llousan e)s meshmbrinh\n
bh=nai ke/leuqon, e)/nq', *)amazo/nwn strato\n
h(/ceis stuga/nor', ai(\ *qemi/skura/n pote
katoikiou=sin a)mfi\ *qermw/donq', i(/na
traxei=a po/ntou *salmudhssi/a gna/qos
e)xqro/cenos nau/taisi, mhtruia\ new=n:
au(=tai/ s' o(dhgh/sousi kai\ ma/l' a)sme/nws.
i)sqmo\n d' e)p' au)tai=s stenopo/rois li/mnhs pu/lais
*kimmeriko\n h(/ceis, o(\n qrasuspla/gxnws se xrh\
lipou=san au)lw=n' e)kpera=n *maiwtiko/n:
e)/stai de\ qnhtoi=s ei)saei\ lo/gos me/gas
th=s sh=s porei/as, *bo/sporos d' e)pw/numos
keklh/setai. lipou=sa d' *eu)rw/phs pe/don
h)/peiron h(/ceis *)asia/d':. a)=r', u(mi=n dokei=
o( tw=n qew=n tu/rannos e)s ta\ pa/nq' o(mw=s
bi/aios ei)=nai; th=|de ga\r qnhth=| qeo\s
xrh/|zwn migh=nai ta/sd' e)pe/rriyen pla/nas.
pikrou= d' e)/kursas, w)= ko/rh, tw=n sw=n ga/mwn
mnhsth=ros. ou(\s ga\r nu=n a)kh/koas lo/gous,
ei)=nai do/kei soi mhde/pw 'n prooimi/ois.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p: i)w/ moi/ moi, e)\ e)/.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
su\ d' au)= ke/kragas ka)namuxqi/zh|; ti/ pou
dra/seis, o(/tan ta\ loipa\ punqa/nh| kaka/;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: h)= ga/r ti loipo\n th=|de phma/twn e)rei=s;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: dusxei/mero/n ge pe/lagos a)thra=s du/hs.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p:
ti/ dh=t' e)moi\ zh=n ke/rdos, a)ll' ou)k e)n ta/xei
e)/rriy' e)mauth\n th=sd' a)po\ stu/flou pe/tras,
o(/pws pe/doi skh/yasa tw=n pa/ntwn po/nwn
a)phlla/ghn; krei=sson ga\r ei)sa/pac qanei=n
h)\ ta\s a(pa/sas h(me/ras pa/sxein kakw=s.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
h)= duspetw=s a)\n tou\s e)mou\s a)/qlous fe/rois,
o(/tw| qanei=n me/n e)stin ou) peprwme/non:
au(/th ga\r h)=n a)\n phma/twn a)pallagh/:
nu=n d' ou)de/n e)sti te/rma moi prokei/menon
mo/xqwn, pri\n a)\n *zeu\s e)kpe/sh| turanni/dos.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p: h)= ga/r pot' e)/stin e)kpesei=n a)rxh=s *di/a;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: h(/doi' a)/n, oi)=mai, th/nd' i)dou=sa sumfora/n.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p: pw=s d' ou)k a)/n, h(/tis e)k *dio\s pa/sxw kakw=s;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: w(s toi/nun o)/ntwn tw=nde/ soi maqei=n pa/ra.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p: pro\s tou= tu/ranna skh=ptra sulhqh/setai;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: pro\s au)to\s au(tou= kenofro/nwn bouleuma/twn.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p: poi/w| tro/pw|; sh/mhnon, ei) mh/ tis bla/bh.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: gamei= ga/mon toiou=ton w(=| pot' a)sxala=|.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p: qe/orton, h)\ bro/teion; ei) r(hto/n, fra/son.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: ti/ d' o(/ntin':; ou) ga\r r(hto\n au)da=sqai to/de.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p: h)= pro\s da/martos e)cani/statai qro/nwn;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: h(\ te/cetai/ ge pai=da fe/rteron patro/s.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p: ou)d' e)/stin au)tw=| th=sd' a)postrofh\ tu/xhs;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: ou) dh=ta, plh\n e)/gwg' a)\n e)k desmw=n luqei/s.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p: ti/s ou)=n o( lu/swn e)sti\n a)/kontos *dio/s;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: tw=n sw=n tin' au)to\n e)ggo/nwn ei)=nai xrew/n.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p: pw=s ei)=pas; h)= 'mo\s pai=s s' a)palla/cei kakw=n;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: tri/tos ge ge/nnan pro\s de/k' a)/llaisin gonai=s.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p: h(/d' ou)ke/t' eu)cu/mblhtos h( xrhsmw|di/a.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: kai\ mhde\ sauth=s e)kmaqei=n zh/tei po/nous.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p: mh/ moi protei/nwn ke/rdos ei)=t' a)poste/rei.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: duoi=n lo/goin se qate/rw| dwrh/somai.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p: poi/oin; pro/deicon, ai(/resi/n t' e)moi\ di/dou.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
di/dwm': e(lou= ga/r, h)\ po/nwn ta\ loipa/ soi
fra/sw safhnw=s, h)\ to\n e)klu/sont' e)me/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
tou/twn su\ th
 me
 th=|de, th
 d' e)moi\ xa/rin
qe/sqai qe/lhson, mhd' a)tima/sh|s lo/gou:
kai\ th=|de me
 ge/gwne th
 loiph
 pla/nhn,
e)moi\ de\ to
 lu/sonta: tou=to ga poqw=.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
e)pei\ proqumei=sq', ou)k e)nantiw/somai
to\ mh\ ou) gegwnei=n pa=n o(/son prosxrh/|zete.
soi\ prw=ton, *)ioi=, polu/donon pla/nhn fra/sw,
h(\n e)ggra/fou su\ mnh/mosin de/ltois frenw=n.
o(/tan pera/sh|s r(ei=qron h)pei/roin o(/ron,
pro\s a)ntola\s flogw=pas h(liostibei=s
po/ntou perw=sa floi=sbon, e)/st' a)\n e)ci/kh|
pro\s *gorgo/neia pedi/a *kisqh/nhs, i(/na
ai( *forki/des nai/ousi dhnaiai\ ko/rai
trei=s kukno/morfoi, koino\n o)/mm' e)kthme/nai,
mono/dontes, a(\s ou)/q' h(/lios prosde/rketai
a)kti=sin ou)/q' h( nu/kteros mh/nh pote/.
pe/las d' a)delfai\ tw=nde trei=s kata/pteroi,
drakonto/malloi *gorgo/nes brotostugei=s,
a(\s qnhto\s ou)dei\s ei)sidw\n e(/cei pnoa/s.
toiou=to me/n soi tou=to frou/rion le/gw:
a)/llhn d' a)/kouson dusxerh= qewri/an:
o)custo/mous ga\r *zhno\s a)kragei=s ku/nas
gru=pas fu/lacai, to/n te mounw=pa strato\n
*)arimaspo\n i(ppoba/mon', oi(\ xruso/rruton
oi)kou=sin a)mfi\ na=ma *plou/twnos po/rou:
tou/tois su\ mh\ pe/laze. thlouro\n de\ gh=n
h(/ceis, kelaino\n fu=lon, oi(\ pro\s h(li/ou
nai/ousi phgai=s, e)/nqa potamo\s *ai)qi/oy.
tou/tou par' o)/xqas e(/rf', e(/ws a)\n e)ci/kh|
katabasmo/n, e)/nqa *bibli/nwn o)rw=n a)/po
i(/hsi septo\n *nei=los eu)/poton r(e/os.
ou(=to/s s' o(dw/sei th\n tri/gwnon e)s xqo/na
*neilw=tin, ou(= dh\ th\n makra\n a)poiki/an,
*)ioi=, pe/prwtai soi/ te kai\ te/knois kti/sai.
tw=n d' ei)/ ti/ soi yello/n te kai\ duseu/reton,
e)pandi/plaze kai\ safw=s e)kma/nqane:
sxolh\ de\ plei/wn h)\ qe/lw pa/resti/ moi.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
ei) me/n ti th=|de loipo\n h)\ pareime/non
e)/xeis gegwnei=n th=s polufqo/rou pla/nhs,
le/g': ei) de\ pa/nt' ei)/rhkas, h(mi=n au)= xa/rin
do\s h(/nper ai)tou/mesqa, me/mnhsai de/ pou.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
to\ pa=n porei/as h(/de te/rm' a)kh/koen.
o(/pws d' a)\n ei)dh=| mh\ ma/thn klu/ousa/ mou,
a(\ pri\n molei=n deu=r' e)kmemo/xqhken fra/sw,
tekmh/rion tou=t' au)to\ dou\s mu/qwn e)mw=n.
o)/xlon me\n ou)=n to\n plei=ston e)klei/yw lo/gwn,
pro\s au)to\ d' ei)=mi te/rma sw=n planhma/twn.
e)pei\ ga\r h)=lqes pro\s *molossa\ ga/peda,
th\n ai)pu/nwto/n t' a)mfi\ *dwdw/nhn, i(/na
mantei=a qa=ko/s t' e)sti\ *qesprwtou= *dio/s,
te/ras t' a)/piston, ai( prosh/goroi dru/es,
u(f' w(=n su\ lamprw=s kou)de\n ai)nikthri/ws
proshgoreu/qhs h( *dio\s kleinh\ da/mar
me/llous' e)/sesqai. tw=nde prossai/nei se/ ti ;
e)nteu=qen oi)strh/sasa th\n parakti/an
ke/leuqon h)=|cas pro\s me/gan ko/lpon *(re/as,
a)f' ou(= palimpla/gktoisi xeima/zh| dro/mois:
xro/non de\ to\n me/llonta po/ntios muxo/s,
safw=s e)pi/stas', *)io/nios keklh/setai,.
th=s sh=s porei/as mnh=ma toi=s pa=sin brotoi=s.
shmei=a/ soi ta/d' e)sti\ th=s e)mh=s freno/s,
w(s de/rketai ple/on ti tou= pefasme/nou.
ta\ loipa\ d' u(mi=n th=|de/ t' e)s koino\n fra/sw,
e)s tau)to\n e)lqw\n tw=n pa/lai lo/gwn i)/xnos.
e)/stin po/lis *ka/nwbos e)sxa/th xqono/s,
*nei/lou pro\s au)tw=| sto/mati kai\ prosxw/mati:
e)ntau=qa dh/ se *zeu\s ti/qhsin e)/mfrona
e)pafw=n a)tarbei= xeiri\ kai\ qigw\n mo/non.
e)pw/numon de\ tw=n *dio\s gennhma/twn
te/ceis kelaino\n *)/epafon, o(\s karpw/setai
o(/shn platu/rrous *nei=los a)rdeu/ei xqo/na:
pe/mpth d' a)p' au)tou= ge/nna penthkonta/pais
pa/lin pro\s *)/argos ou)x e(kou=s' e)leu/setai
qhlu/sporos, feu/gousa suggenh= ga/mon
a)neyiw=n: oi( d' e)ptohme/noi fre/nas,
ki/rkoi peleiw=n ou) makra\n leleimme/noi,
h(/cousi qhreu/ontes ou) qhrasi/mous
ga/mous, fqo/non de\ swma/twn e(/cei qeo/s:
*pelasgi/a de\ de/cetai qhlukto/nw|
*)/arei, dame/ntwn nuktifrourh/tw| qra/sei.
gunh\ ga\r a)/ndr' e(/kaston ai)w=nos sterei=,
di/qhkton e)n sfagai=si ba/yasa ci/fos:
toia/d' e)p' e)xqrou\s tou\s e)mou\s e)/lqoi *ku/pris.
mi/an de\ pai/dwn i(/meros qe/lcei to\ mh\
ktei=nai su/neunon, a)ll' a)pamblunqh/setai
gnw/mhn: duoi=n de\ qa/teron boulh/setai,
klu/ein a)/nalkis ma=llon h)\ miaifo/nos:
au(/th kat' *)/argos basiliko\n te/cei ge/nos.
makrou= lo/gou dei= tau=t' e)pecelqei=n torw=s.
spora=s ge mh\n e)k th=sde fu/setai qrasu\s
to/coisi kleino/s, o(\s po/nwn e)k tw=nd' e)me\
lu/sei. toio/nde xrhsmo\n h( palaigenh\s
mh/thr e)moi\ dih=lqe *titani\s *qe/mis:
o(/pws de\ xw)/ph, tau=ta dei= makrou= lo/gou
ei)pei=n, su/ t' ou)de\n e)kmaqou=sa kerdanei=s.

sp.speaker: *)iw/
sp.p:
e)leleu= e)leleu=,
u(po/ m' au)= sfa/kelos kai\ frenoplhgei=s
mani/ai qa/lpous', oi)/strou d' a)/rdis
xri/ei m' a)/puros:
kradi/a de\ fo/bw| fre/na lakti/zei.
troxodinei=tai d' o)/mmaq' e(li/gdhn,
e)/cw de\ dro/mou fe/romai lu/sshs
pneu/mati ma/rgw|, glw/sshs a)krath/s:
qoleroi\ de\ lo/goi pai/ous' ei)kh=
stugnh=s pro\s ku/masin a)/ths.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
h)= sofo\s h)= sofo\s h)=n o(\s
prw=tos e)n gnw/ma| to/d' e)ba/stase kai\ glw/s-
sa| diemuqolo/ghsen,
w(s to\ khdeu=sai kaq' e(auto\n a)risteu/ei makrw=|,
kai\ mh/te tw=n plou/tw| diaqruptome/nwn
mh/te tw=n ge/nna| megalunome/nwn
o)/nta xernh/tan e)rasteu=sai ga/mwn.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
mh/pote mh/pote/ m', w)=
po/tniai *moi=rai, lexe/wn *dio\s eu)na/-
teiran i)/doisqe pe/lousan:
mhde\ plaqei/hn game/ta| tini\ tw=n e)c ou)ranou=.
tarbw= ga\r a)sterga/nora parqeni/an
ei)sorw=s' *)iou=s a)malaptome/nan
duspla/nois *(/hras a)latei/ais po/nwn.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
e)moi\ d' o(/te me\n o(malo\s o( ga/mos,
a)/fobos: ou) de/dia: mhde\ kreisso/nwn qew=n
e)/rws a)/fukton o)/mma prosdra/koi me.
a)po/lemos o(/de g' o( po/lemos, a)/pora po/rimos:
ou)d' e)/xw ti/s a)\n genoi/man.
ta\n *dio\s ga\r ou)x o(rw=
mh=tin o(/pa fu/goim' a)/n.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
h)= mh\n e)/ti *zeu/s, kai/per au)qa/dhs frenw=n,
e)/stai tapeino/s, oi(=on e)cartu/etai
ga/mon gamei=n, o(\s au)to\n e)k turanni/dos
qro/nwn t' a)/iston e)kbalei=: patro\s d' a)ra\
*kro/nou to/t' h)/dh pantelw=s kranqh/setai,
h(\n e)kpi/tnwn h)ra=to dhnaiw=n qro/nwn.
toiw=nde mo/xqwn e)ktroph\n ou)dei\s qew=n
du/nait' a)\n au)tw=| plh\n e)mou= dei=cai safw=s.
e)gw\ ta/d' oi)=da xw)=| tro/pw|. pro\s tau=ta/ nun
qarsw=n kaqh/sqw toi=s pedarsi/ois ktu/pois
pisto/s, tina/sswn t' e)n xeroi=n pu/rpnoun be/los.
ou)de\n ga\r au)tw=| tau=t' e)parke/sei to\ mh\ ou)
pesei=n a)ti/mws ptw/mat' ou)k a)nasxeta/:
toi=on palaisth\n nu=n paraskeua/zetai
e)p' au)to\s au(tw=|, dusmaxw/taton te/ras:
o(\s dh\ keraunou= krei/sson' eu(rh/sei flo/ga,
bronth=s q' u(perba/llonta kartero\n ktu/pon:
qalassi/an te gh=s tina/kteiran no/son
tri/ainan, ai)xmh\n th\n *poseidw=nos, skeda=|.
ptai/sas de\ tw=|de pro\s kakw=| maqh/setai
o(/son to/ t' a)/rxein kai\ to\ douleu/ein di/xa.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: su/ qhn a(\ xrh/|zeis, tau=t' e)piglwssa=| *dio/s.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: a(/per telei=tai, pro\s d' a(\ bou/lomai le/gw.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: kai\ prosdoka=n xrh\ despo/sein *zhno/s tina;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: kai\ tw=nde/ g', e(/cei duslofwte/rous po/nous.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: pw=s d' ou)xi\ tarbei=s toia/d' e)kri/ptwn e)/ph;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: ti/ d' a)\n foboi/mhn w(=| qanei=n ou) mo/rsimon;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: a)ll' a)=qlon a)/n soi tou=d' e)/t' a)lgi/w po/roi.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: o( d' ou)=n poiei/tw: pa/nta prosdokhta/ moi.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: oi( proskunou=ntes th\n *)adra/steian sofoi/.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
se/bou, proseu/xou, qw=pte to
 kratou=nt' a)ei/.
e)moi\ d' e)/lasson *zhno\s h)\ mhde
 me/lei.
dra/tw, kratei/tw to/nde to
 braxu
 xro/non,
o(/pws qe/lei: daro
 ga ou)k a)/rcei qeoi=s.
a)ll' ei)sorw= ga to/nde to
 *dio\s tro/xin,
to
 tou= tura/nnou tou= ne/ou dia/konon:
pa/ntws ti kaino
 a)ggelw=n e)lh/luqen.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
se\ to\n sofisth/n, to\n pikrw=s u(pe/rpikron,
to\n e)camarto/nt' ei)s qeou\s e)fhme/rois
poro/nta tima/s, to\n puro\s kle/pthn le/gw:
path\r a)/nwge/ s' ou(/stinas kompei=s ga/mous
au)da=n, pro\s w(=n e)kei=nos e)kpi/ptei kra/tous.
kai\ tau=ta me/ntoi mhde\n ai)nikthri/ws,
a)ll' au)/q' e(/kasta fra/ze: mhde/ moi dipla=s
o(dou/s, *promhqeu=, prosba/lh|s: o(ra=|s d' o(/ti
*zeu\s toi=s toiou/tois ou)xi\ malqaki/zetai.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
semno/stomo/s ge kai\ fronh/matos ple/ws
o( mu=qo/s e)stin, w(s qew=n u(phre/tou.
ne/on ne/oi kratei=te kai\ dokei=te dh\
nai/ein a)penqh= pe/rgam': ou)k e)k tw=nd' e)gw\
dissou\s tura/nnous e)kpeso/ntas h)|sqo/mhn;
tri/ton de\ to\n nu=n koiranou=nt' e)po/yomai
ai)/sxista kai\ ta/xista. mh/ ti/ soi dokw=
tarbei=n u(popth/ssein te te tou\s ne/ous qeou/s;
pollou= ge kai\ tou= panto\s e)llei/pw. su\ de\
ke/leuqon h(/nper h)=lqes e)gko/nei pa/lin:
peu/sh| ga\r ou)de\n w(=n a)nistorei=s e)me/.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
toioi=sde me/ntoi kai\ pri\n au)qadi/smasin
e)s ta/sde sauto\n phmona\s kaqw/rmisas.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
th=s sh=s latrei/as th
 e)mh
 duspraci/an,
safw=s e)pi/stas', ou)k a)
 a)lla/caim' e)gw/.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
krei=sson ga\r oi)=mai th=|de latreu/ein pe/tra|
h)\ patri\ fu=nai *zhni\ pisto\n a)/ggelon.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: ou(/tws u(bri/zein tou\s u(bri/zontas xrew/n.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p: xlida=n e)/oikas toi=s parou=si pra/gmasi.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
xlidw=; xlidw=ntas w(=de tou\s e)mou\s e)gw\
e)xqrou\s i)/doimi: kai\ se\ d' e)n tou/tois le/gw.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p: h)= ka)me\ ga/r ti sumforai=s e)paitia=|;

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
a(plw=| lo/gw| tou\s pa/ntas e)xqai/rw qeou/s,
o(/soi paqo/ntes eu)= kakou=si/ m' e)kdi/kws.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p: klu/w s' e)gw\ memhno/t' ou) smikra\n no/son.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: nosoi=m' a)/n, ei) no/shma tou\s e)xqrou\s stugei=n.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p: ei)/hs forhto\s ou)k a)/n, ei) pra/ssois kalw=s.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p: w)/moi; to/de *zeu\s tou)/pos ou)k e)pi/statai.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: a)ll' e)kdida/skei pa/nq' o( ghra/skwn xro/nos.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p: kai\ mh\n su/ g' ou)/pw swfronei=n e)pi/stasai.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: se\ ga\r proshu/dwn ou)k a)\n o)/nq' u(phre/thn.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p: e)rei=n e)/oikas ou)de\n w(=n xrh/|zei path/r.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: kai\ mh\n o)fei/lwn g' a)\n ti/noim' au)tw=| xa/rin.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p: e)kerto/mhsas dh=qen w(s pai=d' o)/nta me.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
ou) ga\r su\ pai=s te ka)/ti tou=d' a)nou/steros
ei) prosdoka=|s e)mou= ti peu/sesqai pa/ra;
ou)k e)/stin ai)/kism' ou)de\ mhxa/nhm' o(/tw|
protre/yetai/ me *zeu\s gegwnh=sai ta/de,
pri\n a)\n xalasqh=| desma\ lumanth/ria.
pro\s tau=ta r(ipte/sqw me\n ai)qalou=ssa flo/c,
leukopte/rw| de\ nifa/di kai\ bronth/masi
xqoni/ois kuka/tw pa/nta kai\ tarasse/tw.
gna/myei ga\r ou)de\n tw=nde/ m' w(/ste kai\ fra/sai
pro\s ou(= xrew/n nin e)kpesei=n turanni/dos.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p: o(/ra nun ei)/ soi tau=t' a)rwga\ fai/netai.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p: w)=ptai pa/lai dh\ kai\ bebou/leutai ta/de.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
to/lmhson, w)= ma/taie, to/lmhso/n pote
pro\s ta\s parou/sas phmona\s o)rqw=s fronei=n,

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
o)xlei=s ma/thn me ku=m' o(/pws parhgorw=n.
ei)selqe/tw se mh/poq' w(s e)gw\ *dio\s
gnw/mhn fobhqei\s qhlu/nous genh/somai,
kai\ liparh/sw to\n me/ga stugou/menon
gunaikomi/mois u(ptia/smasin xerw=n
lu=sai/ me desmw=n tw=nde: tou= panto\s de/w.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
le/gwn e)/oika polla\ kai\ ma/thn e)rei=n:
te/ggh| ga\r ou)de\n ou)de\ malqa/ssh| litai=s
e)mai=s: dakw\n de\ sto/mion w(s neozugh\s
pw=los bia/zh| kai\ pro\s h(ni/as ma/xh|.
a)ta\r sfodru/nh| g' a)sqenei= sofi/smati:
au)qadi/a ga\r tw=| fronou=nti mh\ kalw=s
au)th\ kaq' au(th\n ou)deno\s mei=zon sqe/nei.
ske/yai d', e)a\n mh\ toi=s e)moi=s peisqh=|s lo/gois,
oi(=o/s se xeimw\n kai\ kakw=n trikumi/a
e)/peis' a)/fuktos : prw=ta me\n ga\r o)kri/da
fa/ragga bronth=| kai\ kerauni/a| flogi\
path\r spara/cei th/nde, kai\ kru/yei de/mas
to\ so/n, petrai/a d' a)gka/lh se basta/sei.
makro\n de\ mh=kos e)kteleuth/sas xro/nou
a)/yorron h(/ceis ei)s fa/os: *dio\s de/ toi/
pthno\s ku/wn, dafoino\s ai)eto/s, la/brws
diartamh/sei sw/matos me/ga r(a/kos,
a)/klhtos e(/rpwn daitaleu\s panh/meros,
kelaino/brwton d' h(=par e)kqoinh/setai.
toiou=de mo/xqou te/rma mh/ ti prosdo/ka,
pri\n a)\n qew=n tis dia/doxos tw=n sw=n po/nwn
fanh=|, qelh/sh| t' ei)s a)nau/ghton molei=n
*(/aidhn knefai=a/ t' a)mfi\ *tarta/rou ba/qh.
pro\s tau=ta bou/leu': w(s o(/d' ou) peplasme/nos
o( ko/mpos, a)lla\ kai\ li/an ei)rhme/nos :
yeudhgorei=n ga\r ou)k e)pi/statai sto/ma
to\ *di=on, a)lla\ pa=n e)/pos telei=: su\ de\
pa/ptaine kai\ fro/ntize, mhd' au)qadi/an
eu)bouli/as a)mei/non' h(gh/sh| pote/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
h(mi=n me
 *(ermh=s ou)k a)/kaira fai/netai
le/gein. a)/nwge ga/r se th
 au)qadi/an
meqe/nt' e)reuna=n th
 sofh
 eu)bouli/an.
piqou=: sofw=| ga ai)sxro
 e)camarta/nein.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
ei)do/ti toi/ moi ta/sd' a)ggeli/as
o(/d' e)qw/ucen: pa/sxein de\ kakw=s
e)xqro\n u(p' e)xqrw=n ou)de\n a)eike/s.
pro\s tau=t' e)p' e)moi\ r(ipte/sqw me\n
puro\s a)mfh/khs bo/struxos, ai)qh\r d'
e)reqize/sqw bronth=| sfake/lw| t'
a)gri/wn a)ne/mwn: xqo/na d' e)k puqme/nwn
au)tai=s r(i/zais pneu=ma kradai/noi,
ku=ma de\ po/ntou traxei= r(oqi/w|
sugxw/seien tw=n ou)rani/wn
a)/strwn dio/dous: ei)/s te kelaino\n
*ta/rtaron a)/rdhn r(i/yeie de/mas
tou)mo\n a)na/gkhs sterrai=s di/nais:
pa/ntws e)me/ g' ou) qanatw/sei.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
toia/de me/ntoi tw=n frenoplh/ktwn
bouleu/mat' e)/ph t' e)/stin a)kou=sai.
ti/ ga\r e)llei/pei mh\ ou) parapai/ein
h( tou=d' eu)xh/; ti/ xala=| maniw=n;
a)ll' ou)=n u(mei=s g' ai( phmosu/nais
sugka/mnousai tai=s tou=de to/pwn
meta/ poi xwrei=t' e)k tw=nde qow=s,
mh\ fre/nas u(mw=n h)liqiw/sh|
bronth=s mu/khm' a)te/ramnon.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
a)/llo ti fw/nei kai\ paramuqou= m'
o(/ ti kai\ pei/seis: ou) ga\r dh/ pou
tou=to/ ge tlhto\n pare/suras e)/pos.
pw=s me keleu/eis kako/tht' a)skei=n;
meta\ tou=d' o(/ ti xrh\ pa/sxein e)qe/lw:
tou\s prodo/tas ga\r misei=n e)/maqon,
kou)k e)/sti no/sos
th=sd' h(/ntin' a)pe/ptusa ma=llon.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
a)ll' ou)=n me/mnhsq' a(gw\ prole/gw
mhde\ pro\s a)/ths qhraqei=sai
me/myhsqe tu/xhn, mhde/ pot' ei)/phq'
w(s *zeu\s u(ma=s ei)s a)pro/opton
ph=m' ei)se/balen: mh\ dh=t' au)tai\ d'
u(ma=s au)ta/s. ei)dui=ai ga\r
kou)k e)cai/fnhs ou)de\ laqrai/ws
ei)s a)pe/raton di/ktuon a)/ths
e)mplexqh/sesq' u(p' a)noi/as.

sp.speaker: *promhqeu/s
sp.p:
kai\ mh\n e)/rgw| kou)ke/ti mu/qw|
xqw\n sesa/leutai:
bruxi/a d' h)xw\ paramuka=tai
bronth=s, e(/likes d' e)kla/mpousi
steroph=s za/puroi, stro/mboi de\ ko/nin
